tasks.title: Setup Project Repository
tasks.description: Initialize a new GitHub repository for the Task-Master project.
tasks.details: Create a new repository on GitHub named 'task-master'. Clone the repository locally and set up the basic project structure with Next.js and Supabase integration. Ensure the repository is private and add necessary collaborators.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify repository accessibility and check if the initial commit with the project structure is successful.

tasks.title: Implement Landing Page
tasks.description: Develop the public landing page for Task-Master using Next.js and TailwindCSS.
tasks.details: Create a static Next.js page for the landing page. Use TailwindCSS for styling and shadcn/ui components for UI elements. Include product information, pricing, signup/login CTA, and demo screenshots.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the landing page for responsiveness across different devices and browsers. Ensure all links and CTAs are functional.

tasks.title: Setup Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement user authentication using Clerk for a comprehensive authentication solution.
tasks.details: Integrate Clerk into the Next.js application. Utilize Clerk's built-in UI components for sign-in/sign-up, automatic session management, email verification, password reset, and social login options. Ensure secure handling of user credentials and provide user profile management.
tasks.testStrategy: Test user registration and login flows using Clerk's UI components. Verify that only authenticated users can access protected routes. Ensure proper navigation between authenticated and unauthenticated states.

subtasks.title: Implement User Registration with Clerk
subtasks.description: Create a registration form using Clerk's built-in UI components for user sign-up.
subtasks.details: Utilize Clerk's sign-up page at /sign-up/[[...sign-up]]/page.tsx to allow users to register. Ensure email verification is enabled and integrate social login options as provided by Clerk.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the registration flow to ensure users can sign up successfully and receive email verification.

subtasks.title: Set Up User Login Functionality with Clerk
subtasks.description: Develop a login form using Clerk's built-in UI components for user authentication.
subtasks.details: Use Clerk's sign-in page at /sign-in/[[...sign-in]]/page.tsx for user login. Ensure automatic session management and error handling for invalid credentials.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the login flow to ensure users can authenticate successfully and manage sessions appropriately.

subtasks.title: Configure Email Verification and Password Reset with Clerk
subtasks.description: Set up email verification and password reset functionality using Clerk's built-in features.
subtasks.details: Enable email verification for new user registrations and implement password reset functionality using Clerk's UI components. Ensure users can request a reset link and set a new password securely.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test email verification and password reset flows to ensure they function correctly and securely.

subtasks.title: Securely Handle User Credentials and Sessions with Clerk
subtasks.description: Ensure that user credentials are handled securely and that sessions are managed appropriately using Clerk's security features.
subtasks.details: Utilize Clerk's security best practices for handling user credentials and managing sessions. Ensure session tokens are stored securely and implement user profile management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify that user credentials and sessions are managed securely and that user profile management is functional.

subtasks.title: Update Application with Clerk Components
subtasks.description: Integrate Clerk components into the application for authentication and user management.
subtasks.details: Update the landing page with Clerk components such as SignedIn, SignedOut, and UserButton. Ensure proper navigation between authenticated and unauthenticated states.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test the application to ensure Clerk components are integrated correctly and navigation works as expected.

subtasks.title: Initialize Supabase Client in Next.js Application
subtasks.description: Set up the Supabase client in the Next.js application to enable communication with the Supabase backend.
subtasks.details: Install the Supabase client library and configure it with the project's Supabase URL and Anon Key. This setup is essential for interacting with Supabase services, including authentication. ([supabase.com](https://supabase.com/docs/guides/auth/quickstarts/nextjs?utm_source=openai))

tasks.title: Create Organization and Employee Models
tasks.description: Define database schemas for organizations and employees in Supabase.
tasks.details: Use the provided SQL schema to create 'organizations' and 'employees' tables in Supabase. Ensure foreign key constraints are correctly set up for data integrity.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate the schema by inserting test data and checking relational integrity between organizations and employees.

tasks.title: Develop Employee Management UI
tasks.description: Create the user interface for managing employees using shadcn components.
tasks.details: Implement a table view for listing employees and modal forms for adding/editing employee details. Connect the UI to the Supabase backend for CRUD operations.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform CRUD operations through the UI and verify changes in the Supabase database.

tasks.title: Implement Visual Scheduler
tasks.description: Develop the calendar-based scheduler for assigning shifts to employees.
tasks.details: Use a calendar library like FullCalendar with react-beautiful-dnd for drag-and-drop functionality. Implement a week-view calendar with employee rows and daily columns.
tasks.testStrategy: Test shift assignment and editing through drag-and-drop and modal inputs. Ensure data is correctly saved to the database.

tasks.title: Setup Export Functionality
tasks.description: Implement export functionality to generate PDF and Excel files of schedules.
tasks.details: Create API routes in Next.js for exporting schedules using pdf-lib and exceljs. Ensure the files are downloadable from the browser.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify the export functionality by downloading PDF and Excel files and checking their content and format.

tasks.title: Design Organization Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a dashboard to display organization and scheduling information.
tasks.details: Create a dashboard page using shadcn components to show business/team info and schedule statistics. Ensure it is accessible only to authenticated users.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the dashboard for data accuracy and responsiveness. Verify access control by attempting to access the dashboard without authentication.

tasks.title: Implement Responsive Design
tasks.description: Ensure the application is responsive and accessible on various devices.
tasks.details: Use TailwindCSS to implement responsive design principles across all pages. Test the application on different screen sizes and orientations.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform cross-device testing to ensure consistent user experience on mobile, tablet, and desktop.

tasks.title: Integrate Basic Access Control
tasks.description: Implement basic access control to restrict features based on user roles.
tasks.details: Use Supabase Auth to manage user sessions and restrict access to certain features for non-admin users. Implement middleware in Next.js for route protection.
tasks.testStrategy: Test access control by attempting to access restricted features with different user roles.

tasks.title: Develop Shift Templates Feature
tasks.description: Implement functionality to save and apply shift templates for recurring schedules.
tasks.details: Allow users to save a week or month of shifts as a template. Implement a feature to apply these templates to future scheduling periods.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the creation, saving, and application of shift templates. Verify data persistence and correct application of templates.

tasks.title: Enhance Export Formatting
tasks.description: Improve the formatting of exported PDF and Excel files for better readability.
tasks.details: Refine the export logic to produce well-formatted documents using pdf-lib and exceljs. Focus on table layouts and styling for clarity.
tasks.testStrategy: Export schedules and review the document layout and styling. Ensure consistency across different export formats.

tasks.title: Implement Month View Toggle
tasks.description: Add functionality to toggle between week and month views in the scheduler.
tasks.details: Extend the calendar component to support a month view. Allow users to switch between week and month views seamlessly.
tasks.testStrategy: Test the view toggle functionality and ensure data consistency when switching views.

tasks.title: Polish UI/UX
tasks.description: Enhance the user interface and experience with animations and keyboard shortcuts.
tasks.details: Use shadcn components and TailwindCSS to add subtle animations and keyboard shortcuts for common actions. Focus on improving overall usability.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user testing to gather feedback on UI/UX improvements. Ensure all enhancements work as intended.

tasks.title: Deploy Application
tasks.description: Deploy the Task-Master application to Vercel and configure Supabase for production use.
tasks.details: Set up Vercel for continuous deployment from the GitHub repository. Configure Supabase with production settings and ensure all environment variables are correctly set.
tasks.testStrategy: Perform end-to-end testing on the deployed application to ensure all features work as expected in the production environment.
